<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sixth Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=3670) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 26</row>

</column>

---

Your psychic abilities also allow you to detect the lingering thoughts of spirits and similar entities. While you're exploring but not [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=519), the GM rolls a secret check for you to find [haunts](/Traits.aspx?ID=88) that usually require Searching, as well as [spirits](/Traits.aspx?ID=149), creatures on the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9), and beings made entirely of spiritual essence, such as [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), and [monitors](/Traits.aspx?ID=111).

 You can also potentially notice [ethereal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=284) creatures and spirits inside solid objects, provided they are within 30 feet of you. This applies while Searching, [Seeking](/Actions.aspx?ID=84), and on the automatic secret check from Sixth Sense. You can still notice spirits only on a successful check, and you can't see them if they're more than 5 feet inside an object.

 When you notice a creature with your Sixth Sense, you also learn its location, making it [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to you if it had been [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).
name: Sixth Sense
